com.barchart.feed.ddf.datalink.api
Interface DDF_FeedClientBase

All Known Subinterfaces:
DDF_FeedClient
All Known Implementing Classes:
ListenerClientDDF
public interface DDF_FeedClientBase

Base interface for DDF feed clients. Classes directly implementing this interface should be connectionless listeners. Feeds requiring 2 way communication and a managed connection should implement DDF_FeedClient.

Method Summary
 void bindMessageListener(DDF_MessageListener msgListener)
          Attaches a message listener to the client for data consumption.
 void shutdown()
          Stops listening to the data source.
 void startup()
          Binds the feed client to a port or other data source and begins listening.
 

Method Detail
